'''Aralia Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Inazuman Cedar in [[Narukami Island]]. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Aralia Wood can be found in [[Chinju Forest]] and at the east of [[Serpent's Head]].
